article_title: Cognizant Executive: TriZetto Buy A Game-Changer As Health-Care Vertical Is Booming - Page: 1

og.description: Social technology as well as mobile, advanced analytics and the cloud are creating opportunities in health care, says a Cognizant executive, which is why TriZetto was the right buy at the right time.
